dcterms:description: A Korean dataset containing <text, audio, emotion label> pairs, where a female actor read news articles in six different emotions: neutral, angry, fear, happy, sad, and surprise. The dataset contains 21 hours of speech after trimming silence from the wav files.
dcterms:title: Korean dataset from Acriil

dcterms:creator: J. Lee
K. Cho
T. Hofmann
dcterms:description: A Korean dataset containing 17 hours of drama scripts recorded by a female actor with a natural tone. The dataset was used to train the model to improve attention alignment in speech generation.
dcterms:title: Korean dataset from ETRI
